name: Bauble Trouble
description:
A video game created for the game jam called Three Thing Game, where you need to create a game in 24 hours after being given three random words.

Words for this game were:

  • Santa
  • Gunpowder
  • Baubles

Credits:

  • Music
    • Lewis Chadwick
    • Harry Ballard
  • Programming
    • Andi Negrila
    • Andris Liepins
